attributes.action: Motion of no confidence in David Cameron and the Conservative party manifesto
attributes.background: The current Conservative government has failed the most vulnerable people in society for the last 5 years. Furthermore our countries leader has profited from an offshore trust. The leader of our country is our representative on the international political stage, he does not represent the majority.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament do not have the power to call for a vote of no confidence in a political party's manifesto. You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to government policy.
